item.title: How I Spent My Year of Unemployment
item.description: A little more than a year ago, after a fun 5-year ride, I left Melon. It wasnâ€™t a spur of the moment decision, but something that I was planning for almost 2 years. In the end it was just hard to leave my colleagues (which I now call friends).
